files.name: README.md
files.content:
# Maximum Sum Path
Finding the maximum sum in a path from (0, 0) to (N-1, M-1) when can only move to right or down

## Complexity
* **Time**: ![](https://latex.codecogs.com/svg.latex?O(n))
* **Space**: ![](https://latex.codecogs.com/svg.latex?O(n))

## References
